body_html:
The better solution is to add hooks into predict method, to allow to pass CaptureVariable that would capture the values of hidden layers.

  • @ispirmustafa who is modifying underlaying layers to use MonitoredSession and can easily add this.

The better solution is to add hooks into predict method, to allow to pass CaptureVariable that would capture the values of hidden layers.

@ispirmustafa who is modifying underlaying layers to use MonitoredSession and can easily add this.
body:
The better solution is to add hooks into predict method, to allow to pass `CaptureVariable` that would capture the values of hidden layers. 
- @ispirmustafa who is modifying underlaying layers to use `MonitoredSession` and can easily add this.
